statements: SELECT * FROM golf_event_registrations
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM golf_event_registrations ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT participant_name, registration_fee FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT * FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, registration_fee FROM golf_event_registrations ORDER BY registration_fee
SELECT * FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, event_date FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE registration_fee > 50;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT participant_name, registration_fee FROM golf_event_registrations WHERE registration_fee BETWEEN 30 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM golf_event_registrations ORDER BY event_date DESC, registration_fee ASC;
SELECT * FROM participant_details;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participant_details WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details WHERE registration_fee < 50;
SELECT * FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, registration_fee FROM event_details WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM participant_details WHERE participant_name = 'John';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participant_details WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(event_date) AS latest_event_date FROM event_details;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM participant_details;
SELECT event_name, SUM(registration_fee) AS total_income FROM event_details GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, handicap_index FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE handicap_index > 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01';

SELECT participant_name, event_name, registration_date FROM participants JOIN registrations ON participants.participant_id = registrations.participant_id JOIN events ON registrations.event_id = events.event_id ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE handicap_index > 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, event_name, registration_date FROM participants JOIN registrations ON participants.participant_id = registrations.participant_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_registrations, participants.participant_name FROM registrations JOIN participants ON registrations.participant_id = participants.participant_id GROUP BY participants.participant_name HAVING total_registrations > 3;
SELECT * FROM ParticipantDetails;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM ParticipantDetails WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM EventDates WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT registration_id, registration_date, is_paid FROM EventRegistrations WHERE participant_id = 4;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_phone FROM ParticipantDetails WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ParticipantDetails WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM ParticipantDetails WHERE participant_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventDates WHERE event_date > NOW();
SELECT participant_name, event_name FROM ParticipantDetails JOIN EventRegistrations ON ParticipantDetails.participant_id = EventRegistrations.participant_id;
SELECT COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants, SUM(registration_fee) AS total_fees FROM RegistrationFees GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events;
SELECT registration_id, event_id, registration_fee FROM registrations WHERE registration_fee > 50;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, length, par FROM courses ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM participants WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date;

SELECT participant_name, event_name, score FROM participants JOIN scores ON participants.participant_id = scores.participant_id JOIN events ON scores.event_id = events.event_id WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT course_name, length FROM courses WHERE par <= 72 ORDER BY length DESC;
